```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{bash}
# look at the two files we will be joining (DEG and raw matrix)
head ../output/1213-DEG.tab
head ../output/kallisto.isoform.counts.matrix
```

```{bash}
# join and sort files 
join <(sort ../output/1213-DEG.tab) <(sort ../output/kallisto.isoform.counts.matrix) > ../output/1213-DEG.tab
```

```{bash}
#check output
head ../output/1213-DEG.tab
```

```{bash}
# join in blast results to get associated gene names
join <(sort GCF_026571515.1.tab) <(sort ../output/1213-DEG.tab > 08-DEGandBlastTable.tab
```
